title: Sophie Turner  hated  that PC , Danielle & her were  always called the wives
body_text:
Sophie Turner ‘hated’ that PC, Danielle & her were ‘always called the wives’
Sophie Turner discusses her relationship with Joe Jonas and being part of the Jonas family. She expresses discomfort with being seen as a "wife" and "groupie" in the band. Sophie also addresses false tabloid claims about her parenting and praises Joe as a great father. The couple, married in 2019, has two daughters.
